title: UTF-8 Colored Symbols

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8 Colored Symbols with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Some early UTF-8 code pages, like Miscellaneous Symbols and Dingbats , introduced colored characters that renders as colorful Emojis in the browser. That marked the start of code pages marked as Emojis in UTF-8. Below is a list of the first colored Symbols and Dingbats in UTF-8. Example

⌚

I will display ⌚

I will display ⌚

Will display as: ⌚ I will display ⌚ I will display ⌚ What are Emoji? Emoji are pictographs (symbols) that are presented in a colorful form and used inline in text. They represent things such as faces, weather, vehicles and buildings, food and drink, animals and plants, or icons that represent emotions, feelings, or activities. Char Dec Hex Name ⌚ 8986 231A Watch ⌛ 8987 231B Hourglass done ⏩ 9193 23E9 Fast forward button ⏪ 9194 23EA Fast reverse button ⏫ 9195 23EB Fast up button ⏬ 9196 23EC Fast down button ⏰ 9200 23F0 Alarm clock ⏳ 9203 23F3 Hourglass not done ☔ 9748 2614 Umbrella with rain drops ☕ 9749 2615 Hot beverage ♈ 9800 2648 Aries ♉ 9801 2649 Taurus ♊ 9802 264A Gemini ♋ 9803 264B Cancer ♌ 9804 264C Leo ♍ 9805 264D Virgo ♎ 9806 264E Libra ♏ 9807 264F Scorpius ♐ 9808 2650 Sagittarius ♑ 9809 2651 Capricorn ♒ 9810 2652 Aquarius ♓ 9811 2653 Pisces ♿ 9855 267F Wheelchair symbol ⚡ 9889 26A1 High voltage ⚪ 9898 26AA White circle ⚫ 9899 26AB Black circle ⚽ 9917 26BD Soccer ball ⚾ 9918 26BE Baseball ⛄ 9924 26C4 Snowman without snow ⛅ 9925 26C5 Sun behind cloud ⛎ 9934 26CE Ophiuchus ⛔ 9940 26D4 No entry ⛪ 9962 26EA Church ⛲ 9970 26F2 Fountain ⛳ 9971 26F3 Flag in hole ⛵ 9973 26F5 Sailboat ⛹ 9977 26F9 Man with ball ⛺ 9978 26FA Tent ⛽ 9981 26FD Fuel pump ✅ 9989 2705 Check mark button ✨ 10024 2728 Sparkles ❌ 10060 274C Cross mark ❎ 10062 274E Cross mark button ❓ 10067 2753 Red question mark ❔ 10068 2754 White question mark ❕ 10069 2755 White exclamation mark ❗ 10071 2757 Red exclamation mark ➕ 10133 2795 Plus ➖ 10134 2796 Minus ➗ 10135 2797 Divide ➰ 10160 27B0 Curly Loop ➿ 10175 27BF Double curly Loop ⬛ 11035 2B1B Black large square ⬜ 11036 2B1C White large square ⭐ 11088 2B50 Star ⭕ 11093 2B55 Hollow red circle ★ +1

quiz.explanation: The correct definition of What is 'Emoji'.

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8 Colored Symbols concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8 Colored Symbols effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8 Colored Symbols and how to apply it in your projects.
